modifier.sakuratinker.solid.flavor: Your armor durability, defense, and toughness have all been improved
modifier.sakuratinker.solid.description: Each level grants 1 armor toughness and 1 click back resistance, as well as 10% durability
modifier.sakuratinker.void.description: Attack additional Void damage when attacking
modifier.sakuratinker.wither_symbiosis.f: The power of wither resides in it
modifier.sakuratinker.wither_symbiosis.d:
Your attacks inflict withering and deal additional damage to targets with withering
Don't get too caught up in the withering power
modifier.sakuratinker.ruination.descript:
Deals an additional 4% of the target's current health
 as extra damage on hit.
modifier.sakuratinker.eternity.descripti: The truth of death can never be reached
modifier.sakuratinker.null_almighty.flav: Everything is closed, everything is allowed
modifier.sakuratinker.null_almighty.desc: This armor slashes all damage by 25%.
modifier.sakuratinker.youkaified.descrip: If you are youkai, give some positive buffs.
modifier.sakuratinker.mortal_wound.descr: This weapon weakens the enemy's healing effect for a certain amount of time.
modifier.sakuratinker.magician.descripti:
Spells are on full display in your hands, mana
 mana regeneration, and channel cooldowns are boosted.
modifier.sakuratinker.kobold.description:
When you have more than 40 health, you get extra stats
and if you don't have enough health, you get a penalty.
modifier.sakuratinker.storm_veil.descrip:
If you don't take damage for 30 seconds,
 gain a resistance increase of 4 for 3 seconds.
modifier.sakuratinker.rootedness.descrip: Damage taken is up to 10% of max health.
modifier.sakuratinker.nether_ghost.descr: Kill an enemy to restore hunger, and if hunger is full, restore health.
modifier.sakuratinker.omnipotence.descri: You will be in charge of the end of life.
modifier.sakuratinker.clear_strike.descr: Backstab attacks are doubled, and damage is increased if unconscious.
modifier.sakuratinker.twilit.flavor: That faint light is the blessing of the twilight forest.
modifier.sakuratinker.twilit.description: In the Twilight Forest dimension, damage is increased by 2 and mining speed by 3% per level.
modifier.sakuratinker.precipitate.descri: Increases the tool's mining speed based on the amount of health lost.
modifier.sakuratinker.synergy.descriptio: Steeleaf in the inventory will heal your tools.
modifier.sakuratinker.stalwart.descripti: When a crit hits a crit with a melee tool, there is a 10% chance to gain a 10-second resistance boost.
modifier.sakuratinker.superheat.descript: Increases damage dealt to burning enemies by 20%.
